welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of West Melbourne, where southern hospitality meets urban charm. Known for its scenic parks, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We're happy to have you here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Melbourne International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 is the primary terminal for domestic flights, with a variety of amenities and services available.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for international flights, with customs and immigration facilities for arriving passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit or data cap.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merritt Island Airport is a small, single-story building with basic amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.
